code: import _classCallCheck from"@babel/runtime/helpers/classCallCheck";import{extendObservable,runInAction}from'mobx';import{newDoctor}from"../models/doctor";import{newRegistrationForm}from"../models/registrationForm";export var AuthStore=function AuthStore(){var _this=this;_classCallCheck(this,AuthStore);this.bannerSeen=false;this.selectedSlide=0;this.registerData=newRegistrationForm();this.authState='init';this.doctorType='';this.doctorIndex=0;this.doctor=newDoctor();this.scheduleType='';this.schedules=[];this.setSelectedSlide=function(index){runInAction(function(){if(index===3){_this.bannerSeen=true;}_this.selectedSlide=_this.bannerSeen?3:index;});};this.setRegisterData=function(registerData){runInAction(function(){_this.registerData=registerData;});};this.setDoctorType=function(doctorType){runInAction(function(){_this.doctorType=doctorType;});};this.setDoctorIndex=function(doctorIndex){runInAction(function(){_this.doctorIndex=doctorIndex;});};this.setDoctor=function(doctor){runInAction(function(){_this.doctor=doctor;});};this.setScheduleType=function(scheduleType){runInAction(function(){_this.scheduleType=scheduleType;});};this.setSchedules=function(schedules){runInAction(function(){_this.schedules=schedules;});};this.setAuthState=function(authState){runInAction(function(){_this.authState=authState;});};extendObservable(this,{bannerSeen:false,selectedSlide:0,banks:[],districts:[],specialities:[],authorities:[],benefits:[],insurers:[],registerData:newRegistrationForm(),authState:'init',doctorType:'',doctorIndex:0,doctor:newDoctor(),scheduleType:'',schedules:[]});};export default AuthStore;
